entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING, Portage la Prairie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:10 a.m. CDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow mixed with rain. Temperature falling to zero this afternoon.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this morning. Snow mixed with rain late this morning and early this afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle early this morning. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature falling to zero this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CDT Thursday 20 April 2023
